title: Exposure
creator_credit: Thorold Dickinson and United Nations. Film Board
brief_description: A compilation of footage showing the plight of the world’s homeless estimated at 40 million after World War II. Includes pictures of refugee life in the hope of raising international public awareness and support to help the refugees.
